敬请期待:
<size=16>Pengembang Plugin: NaKune & Dyna
Penerjemah: VDBay
Dan komunitas atas dukungannya.
游戏完全免费，点击这里关注作者蓝飘飘fly，获取最新更新动态: Game ini sepenuhnya gratis — klik di sini untuk mengikuti pembuat LanPiaoPiaoFly!
点击这里关注画师机鱼吐司: Klik di sini untuk mengikuti artis Gfishtus!
修改格子只对大地图有效: Grid modification is only effective for Large Maps.
你可以获得随机1种究极植物\r\n但你将面对更强大的僵尸:
You can get a random ultimate plant
But you will face stronger zombies.
通关挑战模式解锁配方: Unlock this fusion by completing its challenge levels.
该配方仅旅行模式可用: This fusion is only available in Odyssey Mode.
只能融合小喷菇！: Only fusions involving Puff-shrooms can be done.
不能在水上融合！: This cannot be fused on water.
不能在陆地上融合！: This cannot be fused on land.
尚未解锁配方: This fusion has not been unlocked.
一大波僵尸正在接近！: A HUGE WAVE OF ZOMBIES IS APPROACHING
试试把豌豆种到向日葵上面: Try planting Peashooters on top of Sunflowers.
手里拿着植物时可以融合的植物会发光: Plants eligible for fusion will glow when held.
坚果融合后可以回满血哦: When Wall-nuts are fused, their Toughness is restored.
手套可以自由移动或融合植物: Gloves can be used to move or fuse plants manually.
礼盒可开出基础植物，亦可作为任意基础植物进行融合:
Plant Giftbox can spawn basic plants.
It can also be used as any basic plant for fusion.
僵尸掉落的铁桶可以放到豌豆射手和坚果墙上:
The buckets dropped by zombies 
can be placed on the Peashooters and Wall-Nuts.
高坚果作为紫卡只能放在坚果墙上: Tall-nuts can only be planted on top of existing Wall-nuts.
一个格子里可以放3个小喷菇:
You can stack upto three
Puff-shrooms in one grid.
肥料可用于给植物回血，更多用法自行探索:
Fertilizer can be used to restore plants' Toughness.
There are other uses you can explore.
毁灭大喷菇要手动点击哦: To make Soot-shroom attack, you need to click it manually.
橄榄帽可以放到高坚果上: Rugby Helmets can be placed on Tall-Nuts.
忧郁菇作为紫卡只能放在大喷菇上: Gloom-shrooms can only be planted on top of existing Fume-shrooms.
听说了吗？有的睡莲头上会长植物: Have you heard that Lily Pad can have plants grow on their heads?
传说有些僵尸被刺红温了更容易受伤:
Legend has it that some zombies are 
more vulnerable to injury when they look red.
地刺王作为紫卡只能放在地刺上: Spikerocks can only be planted on top of existing Spikeweed.
猫尾草作为紫卡只能放在睡莲上: Cattail can only be planted on top of existing Lily Pads.
路灯花会为周围3*3范围格子提供1点光照等级: Plantern can provide 1 Lumos Level to Lumos plants in a 3x3 Grid.
路灯花会为周围5*5范围格子提供1点光照等级: Sea Lamp-shroom can provide 1 Lumos Level in a 5x5 Grid when its fully grown.
光系植物随着所在格子的光照等级增加而变强: Lumos plants become stronger as the Lumos Level of the grid they are on increases.
木锤会送一只僵尸归西: The Mallet can send a group of zombies towards their doom.
试试将磁力菇吸到的物体放到磁力南瓜或磁力杨桃上: Try placing the objects attracted by the Magnet-shroom onto the Pumpkin Lure or Starpole.
注意到磁力菇边上白色的线了吗，将他们都连起来: Did you notice the white lines next to the Magnet-shroom? Connect them all together.
使用金盏花赚钱！对金银植物使用咖啡豆吧！花钱也送阳光！:
Use Marigolds to earn money!
Use Coffee Beans on Gold and Silver Plants!
Spending Coins earns you Sun!
伞+菜伞: Fusion Formula: Alchemist Umbrella + Umbrella Kale
豌豆+樱桃+樱桃:
Unlock Explod-o-shooter when you finish these challenges.
Fusion Formula: Peashooter + Cherry Bomb + Cherry Bomb
豌豆+坚果+大嘴花:
Unlock Chewzilla when you finish these challenges.
Fusion Formula: Peashooter + Wall-Nut + Chomper
大喷菇+胆小菇+魅惑菇:
Unlock Charm-shroom when you finish these challenges.
Fusion Formula: Fume-shroom + Scaredy-shroom + Hypno-shroom
火炬+辣椒+辣椒:
Unlock Infernowood when you finish the challenge.
Fusion Formula: Torchwood + Jalapeno + Jalapeno
水草+窝瓜+三线:
Unlock Krakerberus when you finish the challenge.
Fusion Formula: Tangle Kelp + Squash + Threepeater
大喷菇+寒冰菇+毁灭菇:
Unlock Doomberg-shroom when you finish these challenges.
Fusion Formula: Fume-shroom + Ice-shroom + Doom-shroom
杨桃+路灯花+磁力菇:
Unlock Stardrop when you finish the challenge.
Fusion Formula: Starfruit + Plantern + Magnet-shroom
仙人掌+南瓜+三叶草:
Unlock Bloverthorn Pumpkin when you finish the challenge.
Fusion Formula: Cactus + Pumpkin + Clover
西瓜+卷心菜+玉米:
Unlock Salad-pult when you finish the challenge.
Fusion Formula: Cabbage-pult + Kernel-pult + Melon-pult
金伞+大蒜或金蒜+伞:
Unlock Alchemist Umbrella when you finish the challenge.
Fusion Formula:
Golden Umbrella + Garlic OR Golden Garlic + Umbrella Leaf
海光菇的效率似乎比阳光菇还要高: Sea Sun-shroom somehow has a higher efficiency than Sun-shroom... Hmm...
这关手套没有冷却，请放心使用: The Glove's cooldown is reduced to 0. Use it effectively to win this mini-game.
小心你没见过的僵尸！: Watch out for zombies you haven't seen before.
这一关只能种植或融合小喷菇！: In this level, you can only grow or fuse Puff-shrooms.
错误：尝试生成不存在的植物！: Error: Attempting to spawn a plant that doesn't exist.
错误：尝试生成不存在的种植预览！: Error: Trying to generate a planting preview that doesn't exist.
已解超级樱桃机枪射手，樱桃机枪+超级樱桃射手: Unlock Gatling Cherrybomber: Gatling Cherry + Explod-o-shooter
已解锁火爆窝炬，火爆窝瓜+窝炬: Unlock Squashed Infernowood: Spicy Squash + Infernowood
解锁究极樱桃机枪，樱桃机枪+超级樱桃射手: Unlock Gatling Cherrybomber: Gatling Cherry + Explod-o-shooter
解锁究极窝炬，超级火炬+火爆窝瓜: Unlock Squashed Infernowood: Spicy Squash + Infernowood
解锁究极加农炮，寒冰加农炮+寒冰毁灭菇: Unlock Cob-livion Cannon: Cryo Cannon + Cryodoom-shroom
魅帝能召唤究极僵尸: Empress-shroom: Can now summon Ultimate Zombies
究极樱桃机枪现在免疫樱桃爆炸: Gatling Cherrybomber: Immunity to cherry explosions
降低究极窝炬生成窝瓜需要的子弹数至10: Squashed Infernowood: Bullets required to spawn a Spicy Squash → 10
究极窝炬每次可以生成两个窝瓜: Squashed Infernowood: Now spawns two Spicy Squash at a time
阳光帝果每次都能回满血: Twin Solar-nut: Can now restore to full health instead of 1500 each time
阳光帝果单次受伤降为10点: Twin Solar-nut: Toughness reduces by 10 for each hit instead of 15
毁灭机枪不再需要休息: Gatling Doom: No more rest between every attack
毁灭机枪每轮都能发射大子弹: Gatling Doom: Can now fire bullets of doom between every attack
冰锥的穿透次数增加到10次: Gatling Icicle-shroom: Increased icicles' penetration by 10 times
冰锥的对冻结的单位造成伤害提升至10倍: Gatling Icicle-shroom: Increased damage to Frozen zombies by 10 times
究极忧郁菇现在会吸收爆炸伤害然后把爆炸能量释放出来: Oblivion-shroom: Now absorbs explosion damage and releases it back to the enemies
提升究极大喷菇的冻结速度为3倍: Doominator-shroom: Increased Freezing speed by 3 times
激光南瓜的僚机可以对地攻击: Laser Pumpkin: Can now carry out ground attacks
黑曜石高坚果受到寒冰菇效果回血10000，火爆辣椒效果回满血: <size=8>Obsidian-nut: Recovers 10,000 HP when affected by Ice Mushrooms, and recover full HP when affected by Jalapeno
黑曜石高坚果会代替左右两株植物受伤: Obsidian-nut: Can now miitigate the damage directed to the two plants on its left and right
究极投手散射概率提升至100%: Wither-pult: Spread-fire is now a 100% chance
究极投手附带瓜盆效果: Wither-pult: Melon Pot's traits are now inherited
绿宝石伞可以让子弹弹到前方其他绿宝石伞上并叠加伤害（无上限）: Midas Umbrella: Now bounce bullets with other Midas Umbrella
绿宝石伞的斩杀线翻倍: Midas Umbrella: Double the kill line...?
究极大炮的装填时间降为原来的1/3: Cob-blivion Cannon: Reload Time reduced to a third of the origina	l
阳光价值提高一个等级: Each Sun now gives double the value
获得2000阳光，然后使你的阳光翻倍: Gain 2000 Sun, then double your total amount of Sun after
手套不再有冷却时间: Glove no longer has a cooldown
每回合开始时在每行生成一个魅惑舞王冰车: At the beginning of each round, a charmed Michael Zomboni is generated in each row
火焰豌豆类会对僵尸附加红温效果: Ignited peas will now add the Enflamed debuff to zombies
全场默认最高光照等级: The Lumos Level for the entire field is set to max
攻守兼备！:
The Best Defense
is a Good Offense
右键拖拽移动屏幕，滚轮缩放屏幕: Hold Right Click to move the screen, Scroll Wheel to zoom.
手机版可能导致画质降低\n重启恢复: Click to change to Windowed Mode or go Full-screen.
将植物挪到最下面一行为花园保卫战的出战区，使用培养的植物战斗吧！\n使用手套可以:
Fully grown plants in the bottom row are used for Garden Defense.
Use the Gloves to fuse fully grown plants.
你为你的卡库新增了一种卡牌: A new plant is available in Plant Selection.
你为你的花园找到了一株植物: You've found a new plant for your Zen Garden!
使用花园中第4行的植物参战！: Use the plants in the 4th row of your Zen Garden in Garden Defense.
咖啡豆对这株植物以平没有效果: The Coffee Bean has no effect on this plant.
咖啡豆对这株植物似乎没有效果: The Coffee Bean has no effect on this plant.
